channel.title: [New] First time model; Plan on doing more in the future!
channel.description:
This is my first time ever using Meta, and it took me about 6 hours to fully complete. Instead of taking pictures, because a picture you can only see so much of the beauty, so I uploaded a vid of me in Meta, playing with it.
Enjoy!
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mz4NWDE0T6c]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mz4NWDE0T6c[/url]

item.title: [New] First time model; Plan on doing more in the future!
item.dc:creator: @Fayt1 .Fayt.
item.description:
@Fayt1 wrote:

Thanks for all the positive feedback. Yes the handle is a big large, and yes, its all 3D. I got confused on how to mirror it, so thats why it looks the way it does.

Still, lots of detail.

And I have proof from Cj, that he even thinks its amazing.

Read full topic

item.title: [New] First time model; Plan on doing more in the future!
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

On closer inspection I can see that the faces were done in a way that you wouldn’t do unless it was your first or one of your first models.

You probably aren’t lying. It’s amazing for a first model but it’s nothing special.

Read full topic

item.title: [New] First time model; Plan on doing more in the future!
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

Takes a long time to “connect those little dots” but not four hours. Took me bout 4 hours for me to make dragunov. 2 Hours drawing design of it and “connecting those little dots” another hour spent on creating the primitives I used, connecting them and modifying them so the gun looked like a dragunov then another hour spent on curving certain areas, just making certain parts of it look better, adding extra things to it and yer.

In this you’ve just traced an image, connected the dots and then used mirror, then connected the dots again. That would take about 1-2 hours though it might of taken you 3 or 4 hours if you made the handle from scratch though I highly doubt it seeing as the blade looks like shit but the handle is highly detailed.

Hey I don’t know and i’m not going to say you didn’t make it though I am going to ask for one thing.
Proof.

Do you have any pics or versions of the model in its earlier stages? If so then please post to prove its authenticity.

Read full topic
item.source: [New] First time model; Plan on doing more in the future!
